question: [Challenge] Turkce: Histograma gore which integer bin occurs most frequently belirt.

qas.question: [Challenge] Turkce: Histograma gore which integer bin occurs most frequently belirt.
[Practice] Deutsch: Gib how many samples were used in total anhand des Histogramms an.
